drupalNodeEvent.title: Cosmopolitan Pasts of China and the Eurasian World (June 11, 12, 18, 19)

field_speakers.processed: Pamela Kyle Crossley (Dartmouth College), Sebastian Eicher (LMU Munich), Mark Gamsa (Tel Aviv University), Soojung Han (Princeton University), Rui Hua (Harvard University), Haina Jin (Communication University of China), Annette Kieser (University of Münster), Elke Papelitzky (KU Leuven), Yuri Pines (Hebrew University of Jerusalem), Susanne Reichert (University of Bonn), Jonathan Skaff (Shippensburg Univ. of Pennsylvania), Anna Stecher (LMU Munich), Nancy Steinhardt (University of Pennsylvania), Lianming Wang (Heidelberg University), Zheng Wei (Peking University), Shao-yun Yang (Denison University), Maddalena Barenghi (Ca’ Foscari University), Chiara Bocci (LMU Munich), Puay Peng Ho (National University of Singapore, UNESCO), Minghui Hu (UC Santa Cruz), Hans van Ess (LMU Munich), Annie Chan (LMU Munich, CRCAO Paris)
